charge_state_settings.description: Settings related to the current charge state, such as charge time, projectile type, muzzle flash effect and single fire audio.

projectile_multipliers.description: Multipliers of the setting values for the projectile based on the charge amount.

charge_start_sound_id.description: [string]Sound to start playing when the chargeup starts.

charge_stop_sound_id.description: [string]Sound id to play when the chargeup ends.

ready_to_fire_sound_id.description: [string]Sound id to play when the weapon can fire.

danger_overcharge_sound_id.description: [string]Sound id to play when the chargeup enters the danger zone.

charge_variable.description: [string]Material variable to set charge value on.

charge_up_muzzle_flash.description: [particles]Particle effect of the muzzle flash while charging.

charge_up_muzzle_flash_loop.description: [particles]Looping particle effect of the muzzle flash while charging.

charge_anim_id.description: [string]What the animation variable is for rotating the barrel.

charge_end_anim_id.description: [string]What the animation variable is for rotating the barrel.

charge_rate_anim_id.description: [string]What the animation variable is for rotating the barrel.

spin_speed_anim_id.description: [string]What the animation variable is for rotating the barrel.

auto_fire_in_safety.description: [bool]If disabled, will allow the user to keep the charge as long as they are holding the trigger.
